summary: Jack was doing great trading shares until he wasn't. He gets a job on a bike at Quicksilver speed delivery. There he befriends Hector and the cute Terri. Jack gets an enemy in the criminal Gypsy.

director: Director: Thomas Michael Donnelly (as Tom Donnelly)
title: Quicksilver, la pista rápida del éxito
